ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(Payroll_Training_Completed__c ))), NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name, "System Admin")), OR(ISBLANK($User.Job_Name__c),NOT(CONTAINS("District Sales Manager:District Sales Assistant:Sales Leader:Sales Enablement:Sales Representative:Sales Engineer:Area Manager:Area Assistant:Zone Manager:Zone Assistant",$User.Job_Name__c))), ISBLANK(TEXT(State_IDs_on_File__c))|| EE_Demographic_Data_Scanned__c=FALSE|| Wage_Info_Scanned__c=FALSE|| LiabDeposits_and_Returns_Scanned__c=FALSE)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Fields required: "State IDs on File", "EE Demographic Data Scanned", "Wage Info Scanned", "Liab/Deposits and Returns Scanned".
